__e: If you don't know, how can you repair it?
That would make it difficult for you to assist me with repairs.
I mean, everyone has tough rides. Your turn. Come on.
I could repair it right away and have it for you tonight.
They assigned me to learn from you, just in case if anything breaks, somebody else knows how to fix it.
Because I said to myself, "If I break, if I'm hurt, whatever. "I ain't gonna fix it.
There's maybe five people in the world who can restore them.
I knew it was wrong. I thought someone would find them and mend them.
If you want to repair them, you'll have to learn to do it yourselves.
Quentin, sometimes trying to fix something only makes it worse.
Just traveling down the road with a chainsaw.
They can't fix a damn thing in this place.
If you want me to teach your men how to repair a warp drive, fine.
I'd just love to know a little more about you, other than the fact you can fix an old car.
I just want to get back in the office, figure out a way to repair the damage.
If what the professor has given me is accurate, it is possible to repair the damage.
You will make your apology to me tomorrow night... .. and you will repair the damage you've done.
